member.name: WS_ITEM_RANGE
member.summary: Defines the minimum and maximum number of items that may appear when using ,WS_REPEATING_ELEMENT_CHOICE_FIELD_MAPPING, or WS_REPEATING_ANY_ELEMENT_FIELD_MAPPING within a . The constraint is only enforced during deserialization.

member.name: WS_ITEM_RANGE.minItemCount
member.summary: The minimum number of elements that must appear.

member.name: WS_ITEM_RANGE.maxItemCount
member.summary: The maximum number of items that may appear.
